title: Ace
creator: DASY Consortium
description:
Ace is an accessibility checker for EPUB to assist with the evaluation of conformance to EPUB Accessibility 1.0 requirements. 

Ace performs automated checks of EPUB content (relying notably on Deque’s aXe library), and also extracts data intended to be used in later manual inspection.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
